life, the theses in (1) through (4) are all false. Take (2), for example. If directly
killing an innocent person is murder, and thus is impermissible, then the
mother’s directly killing the innocent person inside her is murder, and thus
is  impermissible.  But  it  cannot  seriously  be  thought  to  be  murder  if  the
mother performs an abortion on herself to save her life. It cannot seriously
be said that she mustrefrain, that she mustsit passively by and wait for her
